favourite.article: I'm so encouraged today by this song. May our good Lord bless you all & may the Holy Spirit teach us how to pray. Amen.
Mhhhhh what a song I'm just blessed with it. Please Lord teach us to pray.
I have not heard this song in years but this morning the Lord woke me up with this song. Just to go deeper and deeper in Christ Jesus. To have a more affective prayer ministry. Teach me Lord, yes.
Power to pray and power to do. This is what I feel need in last couple of days. Then God gave me this song today! Thank You Lord.
Each time I listen to this hymn, I feel the love of God around and in me
Amen! Yes Lord teach us how to pray! Teach us Lord the true meaning of prayer.
I really and want God to actually teach me how to pray. Are you also one who doesn't know how to pray? Then I dedicate this sound to you. Be blessed.
